Verb *read*
************

Documentation for the read verb in */cmds/verbs/read.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``read <something>``
 |  ``read from <something>``
 |  ``read in <something>``
 |  ``read about <topic>``
 |  ``read about <topic> in <something>``
 |  ``read <topic> in <something>``
 |  ``read <topic> from <something>``

 Read in books about stuff, read signs.
